extension.news:
Changelog 0.0.3: - Fixed Rescrape running twice
Changelog 0.0.2: - Added Rescrape Item option
Changelog 0.0.1: - Initial release

extension.description: EXPerimental plugin that lets you play music from Youtube Music.
extension.news: 1.0~beta10 (2022-04-30) - Fix the handling of artist albums.

extension.summary: TheMovieDb Helper - Now With Trakt Support!
TheMovieDb Helper - ¡Ahora con soporte para Trakt!
TheMovieDb Helper - Maintenant avec support Trakt!
extension.description: TheMovieDb Helper provides details about movies, tvshows and actors from TMDb. Users can access a variety of lists from TMDb and Trakt.
TheMovieDb Helper proporciona detalles sobre películas, programas de televisión y actores de TMDb. Los usuarios pueden acceder a una variedad de listas desde TMDb y Trakt.
TheMovieDb Helper fournit des détails sur les films, les émissions de télévision et acteurs de TMDb. Les utilisateurs peuvent accéder à une variété de listes TMDb et Trakt.
extension.news: - Improved PVR service matching - Avoid unnecessary FanartTV re-requests - Add In-Progress Episodes Trakt list - Add Still to Watch Trakt list (In-Progress+Watchlist) - Allow stacking of episodes from same show in calendar - Fix collection matching and query encoding - Better list filtering options - Add cacheonly=true param for faster dialog widget loading - Add script getter/setter functions for audio/subs in player - Allow larger sync list items per page limits - Fix plugincategory labels - Fix randomised lists not refreshing - Fix string formatter for update to Py3.7 in 19.3 - Fix fallback players when asserted value not available - Allow both mark as watched/unwatched in Trakt options - Update branding and icons - Add temporary service pause for custom dialogs via Window.Property(TMDbHelper.ServicePause) - Artwork monitor fixes

extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.news:
Changelog 0.0.11-beta25: Fix anilist watchlist sorting issue
Changelog 0.0.11-beta24: Added a setting to scrape general Anime sources instead of English only
Changelog 0.0.11-beta23: Fix playing next
Changelog 0.0.11-beta22: Fix simkl indexers shows Fix 'mark as watched' for non integrated watchlist users
Changelog 0.0.11-beta21: Made nyaa scraping handle parts more like tmdb helper Also fixed anilist watchlist loading for certain shows
Changelog 0.0.11-beta20: Add tmdb helper support Fix next up
Changelog 0.0.11-beta19: Implement Kaito 10 menus for Search, Trending, and Popular lists (including the variants of those lists).
Changelog 0.0.11-beta18: Fix parameter not being passed to episode packs
Changelog 0.0.11-beta17: Fix trakt issue where no second alias for shows
Changelog 0.0.11-beta16: Add Kitsu watchlist import support
Changelog 0.0.11-beta15: Add Anilist support to watchlist episode update
Changelog 0.0.11-beta14: Made a couple of fixes for MAL watchlist
Changelog 0.0.11-beta13: Add MAL watchlist import support Improve trakt id fetch for seasons and romaji users
Changelog 0.0.11-beta12: Change next page image to an arrow
Changelog 0.0.11-beta11: Trakt Id fetch update Lot of scraping changes Cloud scraping improvements
Changelog 0.0.11-beta10: Fix some episode processing issues for batch episodes Correct current and next seasons
Changelog 0.0.11-beta9: Update AniListBrowser.py by updating the season, year Made cloud scraping a little more consistent
Changelog 0.0.11-beta8: Changed Fanart Resolution from 1024 x 576 to 1920 x 1080 Added an option to disable gogo sources
Changelog 0.0.11-beta7: Fix issue where romajii language users get wrong series Add proper scraping for one piece/detective conan
Changelog 0.0.11-beta6: Add episode check to batches with no season. put sources with special or extra in name at bottom of auto play list
Changelog 0.0.11-beta5: Fix regex for batch episodes. Add bluray search term to batch episodes
Changelog 0.0.11-beta4: Add check to batch torrent to match seasons
Changelog 0.0.11-beta3: Remove nonalphanumeric characters from anime title on scraping fix misnamed variable
Changelog 0.0.11-beta2: Minor visual bug with the background Title Language seem to be fixed
Changelog 0.0.11: Updated nyaa scraping Updated parsing filename (credits: igorcmoura/anitopy) Updated Next Up Added Fanart.Tv support (Clear Logos) Added a4ksubtitles support Added Skip Intro Automatic close popup Fixed Non-Debrid sources (gogo embed Fixed [Bug] Next Up: Please update your app Updated tvshow/episode builder (credits: seren/nixgates)
Changelog 0.0.10: Refactor code for Kodi 19 support Add setting to toggle reuselanguageinvoker (If enabled, expect some instability but much faster menu speeds) Fix MyAnimeList sortby [Prometheusx-git] Fix AllDebrid playback [Gujal00]
Changelog 0.0.9: Kodi 19 support Updated anime season for upcoming and popular this season menu items
Changelog 0.0.8: Fixed movies not working in AniList watchlist Fixed scrape and rescrape running twice Updated anime season for upcoming and trending menu items
Changelog 0.0.7: Improved cloud inspection Adjusted 'Next Up' Adjusted 'Rebuild Database' Fixed gogo embed Fixed new episodes not being added
Changelog 0.0.6: Added Premiumize and Real-Debrid cloud inspection Added setting 'Seperate Dubs and Subs' to seperate anime into sub and dub list items if dub is available (test flight) Added instruction dialog for MAL/AniList auth for linux os Adjusted set titles to romaji/english Adjusted Tertiary Dub filter Improved 'Next Up' Improved season torrent pack scraping
Changelog 0.0.5: Fixed bug
Changelog 0.0.4: Fixed bug
Changelog 0.0.3: Added Rescrape Item option to episode context menu Added setting 'Title Language' to set titles to romaji/english Added 'Airing Dubbed Anime' menu item Added 'Next Up' to watchlist menu items Adjusted content types of items Adjusted MAL/AniList auth for linux os Improved season torrent pack handling
Changelog 0.0.2: Added premiumize support Improved handling of episodes/seasons retrieval Improved nyaa search Added 'episodes' content type to set menu content type setting Added menu content type to be applied to watchlist landing page
Changelog 0.0.1: Initial release
